title: Pope Francis arriving in majority Buddhist Sri Lanka must apologize for the crimes of the Catholic Church?
content: The head of the Catholic Church and head of the sovereign nation known as Vatican City is to arrive in Sri Lanka in January 2015. It will be the 2nd visit of a Pope to a majority Buddhist nation wherein Catholics comprise just over 1million of a 20million population of which 14million are Sinhalese Buddhists. It…
